item.title: 阿波罗计划建立私人信用贷款交易平台
item.description: 据知情人士透露，阿波罗全球管理公司（Apollo Global Management Inc.【原文：Apollo Global Management Inc. is planning to build out a secondary trading desk for private debt provided by a handful of lenders, according to people with knowledge of the matter who asked not to be identified as the details are private.】

item.title: 市政债券市场的巨额交易热潮没有停止的迹象
item.description: 今年的市政债券销售额已创下历史新高，而超大型交易（超过 10 亿美元的交易）的步伐也几乎没有放缓的迹象。【原文：It’s already a record-setting year for muni-bond sales, and the relentless pace of mega-deals — those over $1 billion — is displaying little signs of slowing.】

item.title: 利比亚石油出口涓涓流出，即使当局阻止装货
item.description: 政治危机导致利比亚产量骤降，尽管出口受到限制，但石油仍在源源不断地从利比亚流出。【原文：Oil is still trickling out of Libya, despite restrictions on exports during a political crisis that has caused the country’s output to plunge.】

item.title: 美国数据支持对美联储减息的押注，日元对美元汇率攀升 1
item.description: 在一份经济报告显示美国劳动力市场脆弱，从而推动美联储降息之后，日元兑美元汇率飙升超过1%。【原文：Japan’s yen surged more than 1% against the dollar after an economic report showed fragility in the US labor market, boosting the case for the Federal Reserve to cut interest rates.】

item.title: 劳动力数据疲软助推美联储减息押注，美国收益率曲线出现倒挂
item.description: 美国两年期国债收益率自 2022 年以来仅第二次跌破 10 年期国债收益率，原因是就业数据弱于预期，支持了对美联储大幅降息的押注。【原文：The US two-year note’s yield fell below the 10-year note’s for only the second time since 2022 as weaker-than-anticipated job openings data bolstered wagers on steep interest-rate cuts by the Federal Reserve.】

item.title: 利比亚接近达成中央银行协议，但障碍依然存在
item.description: 利比亚对立的政治派别就任命央行行长的路线图达成一致，这是朝着缓解导致这个欧佩克国家大部分石油停产的僵局迈出的试探性一步。【原文：Libya’s rival political factions agreed to a road map to appoint a central bank governor, a tentative step toward easing a deadlock that’s led to the halt of much of the OPEC nation’s oil production.】

item.title: 博斯蒂克称美联储就业和通胀目标面临的风险已趋于平衡
item.description: 亚特兰大联邦储备银行行长拉斐尔-博斯蒂克（Raphael Bostic）表示，自2021年以来，该央行的两项任务--稳定物价和最大就业率--首次实现了平衡，但他补充说，他 "还没有准备好 "宣布战胜通胀。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Atlanta President Raphael Bostic said the central bank’s two mandates — stable prices and maximum employment — are now in balance for the first time since 2021, though he added he is “not quite prepared” to declare victory over inflation.】

item.title: 医疗补助观点令市场失望，Centene 大跌
item.description: Centene Corp. 的股价创下一年来最大跌幅，此前该保险公司发布的医疗补助计划成员预测令投资者失望。【原文：Centene Corp. shares fell the most in a year after the insurer released a projection for members in its Medicaid program that disappointed investors.】

item.title: 西班牙推选何塞-路易斯-埃斯克里瓦部长领导中央银行
item.description: 西班牙政府部长何塞-路易斯-埃斯克里瓦（Jose Luis Escriva）被选为该国央行行长，及时参与了欧元区下周可能做出的降息决定。【原文：Spanish government minister Jose Luis Escriva was selected as the country’s central bank chief, in time to partake in the euro zone’s likely decision next week to cut interest rates.】

item.title: 德意志银行按需增加杠杆贷款风险转移额度
item.description: 据知情人士透露，在投资者的强烈要求下，德意志银行（Deutsche Bank AG）将重大风险转移的规模扩大了 10 亿美元。【原文：Deutsche Bank AG bolstered the size of a significant risk transfer by $1 billion after strong investor demand, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 塔加资源公司回绝了更大竞争对手威廉姆斯公司的收购意向
item.description: 知情人士称，最近几个月，Targa Resources Corp. 拒绝了较大竞争对手 Williams Cos. 的非正式收购意向，这是管道行业持续寻求整合的又一信号。【原文：Targa Resources Corp. rebuffed informal takeover interest from larger rival Williams Cos. in recent months, people with knowledge of the matter said, in another signal of sustained appetite for consolidation in the pipeline industry.】

item.title: 公司在最近的回购潮之前批准了 1,070 亿美元的回购计划
item.description: 在周二股市暴跌之后，股票多头正在寻找解脱的迹象，他们可能会得到一位熟悉的朋友的帮助：美国公司。【原文：Equity bulls looking for signs of relief after Tuesday’s stock rout may get a hand from a familiar friend: corporate America.】

item.title: 数万亿美元的指数热潮让美国企业赚得盆满钵满
item.description: 随着贝莱德（BlackRock）和先锋集团（Vanguard Group）等公司日益成为全球最大公司的主要投资者，指数基金革命正在撼动美国企业界，这已不是什么秘密。【原文：It’s no secret that the index-fund revolution is shaking up Corporate America, as the likes of BlackRock and Vanguard Group become ever-more dominant investors in the world’s biggest companies.】

item.title: 优步作为投资级公司启动首次债券销售
item.description: 自获得蓝筹股地位以来，优步科技公司（Uber Technologies Inc.【原文：Uber Technologies Inc. is tapping the US investment-grade bond market for the first time since it attained blue-chip status.】

item.title: 美国贸易赤字扩大至 788 亿美元，为两年来最大
item.description: 受商品进口激增的推动，美国 7 月份的贸易赤字扩大到两年来的新高，这在一定程度上反映出企业在可能发生的码头工人罢工之前加大了确保充足供应的力度。【原文：The US trade deficit widened to a two-year high in July, fueled by a surge in imports of goods and partly reflecting stepped-up efforts by companies to ensure adequate supply ahead of a potential dockworkers’ strike.】

item.title: 交易商关注库存下降和巴西天气，咖啡价格上涨
item.description: 阿拉比卡和罗布斯塔咖啡期货上涨，原因是库存减少和头号生产国巴西的持续干旱天气威胁到全球供应。【原文：Arabica and robusta coffee futures rose as a drawdown of stockpiles and persistently dry weather in top producer Brazil threaten global supplies.】

item.title: 都柏林机场运营商警告称乘客人数将超过上限
item.description: 都柏林机场运营商 daa 预测，都柏林机场将首次突破爱尔兰规划机构规定的每年 3200 万乘客的上限。【原文：Dublin airport is set to breach an annual 32 million cap on passengers that was imposed by Ireland’s planning body for the first time, its operator daa has forecast.】

item.title: 高盛认为韩国推迟纳入富时债券指数
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：South Korea’s inclusion in a key bond index is likely to be delayed until 2025 due to slow investor uptake on settling bond trades internationally, according to analysts at Goldman Sachs Group Inc.】

item.title: 挪威财富基金顾问考虑将以色列排除在外
item.description: 挪威1.7万亿美元主权财富基金的道德委员会表示，它可能会建议扩大因与以色列有联系而被排除在外的公司名单。【原文：The ethics council for Norway’s $1.7 trillion sovereign wealth fund said it may recommend widening the list of companies to exclude over their links with Israel, which is fighting a war in Gaza and operating militarily in the West Bank.】

item.title: 信实中标印度电池储能千兆工厂项目
item.description: 信实工业有限公司（Reliance Industries Ltd.）中标建造一个 10 千兆瓦时的电池装置，此举将有助于亿万富翁穆克什-安巴尼（Mukesh Ambani）的企业集团深化其在新能源领域的布局。【原文：Reliance Industries Ltd. has won a bid to build a 10 gigawatt-hour battery unit, a move that will help billionaire Mukesh Ambani’s conglomerate deepen its footprint in the new energy space.】

item.title: 尽管八月局势动荡，多策略对冲基金仍取得稳定收益
item.description: 尽管全球市场遭受重创，人们猜测美国可能出现经济衰退，但 Walleye Capital 和其他多策略对冲基金上个月仍取得了稳定的回报。【原文：Walleye Capital and other multistrategy hedge funds produced steady returns last month despite whiplash in global markets and speculation about a possible US recession.】

item.title: 德意志银行首席执行官敦促德国人更加努力工作以摆脱低迷
item.description: 德意志银行首席执行官克里斯蒂安-斯温（Christian Sewing）呼吁德国人如果想让国家经济重回正轨，就必须更加努力地工作。【原文：Deutsche Bank Chief Executive Christian Sewing called on Germans to work harder if they want to get the country’s economy back on track.】

item.title: 尼日利亚法院审议 Binance 高管的保释申请
item.description: 尼日利亚法院推迟了对 Binance 控股有限公司高管保释申请的判决，该高管已在西非国家被关押了六个多月。【原文：A Nigerian court deferred judgment on a bail application by a Binance Holdings Ltd. executive who’s been held in the West African country for more than six months.】

item.title: 新西兰房价连续第六个月下跌，利率造成影响
item.description: CoreLogic Inc.的数据显示，受利率上升和经济疲软下就业保障不确定性的影响，8月份新西兰房价连续第六个月下跌。【原文：New Zealand house prices fell for a sixth straight month in August, weighed down by elevated interest rates and uncertainty over job security in a weakening economy, according to CoreLogic Inc.】

item.title: 阿联酋 Adnoc 公司购买埃克森公司德克萨斯州氢气厂 35% 的股份
item.description: 阿布扎比国家石油公司（Abu Dhabi National Oil Co.）同意持有埃克森美孚公司（Exxon Mobil Corp.【原文：Abu Dhabi National Oil Co. agreed to take a 35% stake in Exxon Mobil Corp.’s proposed hydrogen project in Baytown, Texas, which is likely to be the world’s biggest once built.】

item.title: BTG 收购纽约银行后将在美国提供银团贷款
item.description: 拉丁美洲最大的独立投资银行 Banco BTG Pactual SA 在 6 月份同意收购一家位于纽约的贷款机构后，正计划进军美国银团贷款市场。【原文：Banco BTG Pactual SA, Latin America’s biggest independent investment bank, is planning to enter the US syndicated loan market after agreeing in June to buy a New York-based lender.】

item.title: 需求下降后，沃尔沃汽车缩减电动汽车目标
item.description: 沃尔沃汽车公司（Volvo Car AB）放弃了在本十年末只销售全电动汽车的目标，这是最近一家因需求减弱而放弃电动汽车雄心的制造商。【原文：Volvo Car AB abandoned a target to sell only fully electric cars by the end of this decade, the latest manufacturer to walk back its EV ambitions due to waning demand.】

item.title: 流量需求增加，克里姆林宫石油和天然气收入增长五分之一
item.description: 随着俄罗斯原油价格的飙升和天然气流向国外市场的增加，俄罗斯政府 8 月份的石油和天然气税收收入比一年前激增了五分之一。【原文：The Russian government’s revenues from taxes on oil and gas surged by a fifth in August from a year ago following soaring prices of the nation’s crude and higher gas flows to foreign markets.】

item.title: 英伟达股价下跌令交易员在 "真空 "状态下关注 100 美元股价水平
item.description: 周二，Nvidia 公司市值锐减 2,790 亿美元，交易员们纷纷在图表上寻找蛛丝马迹，以确定痛苦的终点。【原文：The sharp selloff that wiped a record $279 billion off Nvidia Corp.’s market value on Tuesday has traders scouring charts for clues as to where the pain might end.】
